channel.title: Disney with Star Wars
channel.description:
So recently, Lucas(the people who made you're favorite sags Star Wars) has sold the rights to Disney. From what I heard, the new movies are going to be before Annakin. Or Before obi-won, I think the best would be Obi Won starting out as a Kid. With a different more lengthy story than Annakin.
Thoughts? What would you like to see from Disney in the upcoming series? Disney will never be able to compete with Lucas, but I think Disney can appeal the Star Wars fans.

item.title: Disney with Star Wars
item.dc:creator: @lurtz1230 lurtz1230
item.description:
@lurtz1230 wrote:

Frell:

As long as Lucas is still directing/making sure everything is in line I see no issues. Disney did phenomenal with Pirates of the Carribean so im sure they’ll deliver.

Agree with you %100.

Read full topic

item.title: Disney with Star Wars
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:10, topic:471003”][quote author=Frell link=topic=588535.msg4172949#msg4172949 date=1354589571]
Disney did phenomenal with Pirates of the Carribean so im sure they’ll deliver.
[/quote]Your crazy. The first two were really good but the last two they made were pretty shitty. The third one seemed rushed, the fourth one was made by pirates.[/quote]
Thank god we were born with opinions

Read full topic

item.title: Disney with Star Wars
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:10, topic:471003”][quote author=Frell link=topic=588535.msg4172949#msg4172949 date=1354589571]
Disney did phenomenal with Pirates of the Carribean so im sure they’ll deliver.
[/quote]Your crazy. The first two were really good but the last two they made were pretty shitty. The third one seemed rushed, the fourth one was made by pirates.[/quote]
POTC 1, I wasn’t interested in. The second one was the one that I enjoyed the most. Third, also pretty cool. Fourth one was rushed though, not 3rd. Fourth was just un-appealing and so such a horrible story-line.

Read full topic
